interpretation:
The Fortune Cookie card represents fate and the idea that our destiny is already written. This card encourages us to look for signs and signals in our lives that may be pointing us towards our true path. It also suggests that we trust in the wisdom of the universe and have faith that everything will work out as it is meant to.

When the Fortune Cookie appears in a reading, it is important to pay attention to any messages that come our way, whether through dreams, intuition, or synchronicities. This card reminds us that we are not alone and that the universe is always guiding us towards our highest good.

The Fortune Cookie also encourages us to take responsibility for our actions and to make choices that align with our true purpose. By staying connected to our intuition and trusting in the wisdom of the universe, we can create a life that is truly fulfilling and meaningful.

Overall, the Fortune Cookie card reminds us to have faith in the journey of life and to trust that everything happens for a reason. By embracing our destiny and living in alignment with our true purpose, we can find peace and fulfillment in all aspects of our lives.
